report.title: Little Effect, Little Desire
report.author: Saint Elsewhere
report.bodytext: The setup: I'm on 20 mg per day of Paxil (an SSRI). I'm an experienced MDMA user, but with no use of any sort of (recreational) drug for nearly a year. /n /n On the spur of the moment, I obtained two 100 mg. MDMA gelcaps. Both were taken with milk, 20 minutes apart. This dose (about 2 mg/kg) would normally have been a put-me-on-my-ass roll, but this time (the first time I've tried MDMA since being put on Paxil) was wholly unremarkeable. I would rate the effects as being on par with somewhat less then half of what I had actually taken...relaxed and a little energetic, but little else. As usual after MDMA I slept lightly, but there was little 'hangover' the next day. /n /n If I were to repeat the experiment, I might pre-load with 5-HTP, take more MDMA (it was all I had), and/or go off the Paxil for a day or two (with the warning that I'm perfectly prepared to deal with potential unpleasentness like withdrawal.) /n /n Speaking from experience, SSRIs seem to be quite effective at supressing the desire to use MDMA. It was mainly boredom that brought me to try it again.
